channel.title: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD)
channel.description: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD) generated by script

item.title: Forced Labor, Taiwan and the Implications of the US-Malaysia Trade Agreement
item.description: The new U.S.-Malaysia trade agreement’s forced labor import ban requirement may pose new risks for Taiwanese electronics firms. But it’s also an opportunity to make progress.

item.title: Our Best Profiles of 2025
item.description: The figures who shaped the way we thought about the world this year.

item.title: The Best Conversations of the Year
item.description: FP Live’s guests included Europe’s top diplomat and a Gen Z economic whisperer.

item.title: A Year of Global Protest
item.description: How Gen Z-led movements shaped 2025—and what comes next.

item.title: The Year That Took India and Pakistan to the Brink
item.description: The geopolitical ripple effects of the nuclear-armed rivals’ worst conflict in decades.

item.title: FP’s Holiday Book List
item.description: Our columnists and staff writers recommend their top reads for the end of the year.

item.title: 2025 Redefined the U.S.-China Rivalry
item.description: From trade wars to tech competition, this year was a vicious cycle of escalations, retaliations, and negotiations.

item.title: 2025 in review: business
item.description: Industry raced to adapt to intensifying pressure to move faster, win work on Golden Dome and other efforts.

item.title: Erdogan’s Imperial Delusions
item.description: Turkish power does not match the president’s ambitions.
